meanings.definition: A soft woolly substance prepared from the young leaves of Artemisia chinensis, used in moxibustion.
meanings.sent1: The moxa felt warm on my skin during the treatment.
meanings.sent2: The herbalist used moxa to help relieve my muscle pain.
meanings.sent3: The moxa seemed to whisper soothing words to my aching body.
meanings.sent4: As the moxa burned, it released a comforting aroma into the room.
meanings.sent5: The gentle touch of moxa brought relief to my sore muscles.

meanings.definition: A cone or cylinder of dried and compressed mugwort leaves, placed on the skin and ignited to produce heat.
meanings.sent1: Placing the moxa on my back created a warm sensation.
meanings.sent2: The acupuncturist carefully lit the moxa to start the treatment.
meanings.sent3: The moxa crackled softly as it worked its magic on my skin.
meanings.sent4: The moxa glowed like a tiny fire on my body, bringing comfort.
meanings.sent5: I could feel the moxa's gentle heat seeping into my muscles.

meanings.definition: The act of applying moxa to the body for therapeutic purposes.
meanings.sent1: The moxa application helped improve my circulation.
meanings.sent2: I felt relaxed during the moxa therapy session.
meanings.sent3: The moxa treatment made me feel like a cozy marshmallow.
meanings.sent4: The moxa session was like a warm hug for my body.
meanings.sent5: I could feel the benefits of moxa spreading through my body.
